label: Problems African American Hist
description: Covers in depth, major problems in the African American experience and in the historiography of that experience, including historical periods, themes and paradigms. Same as AFRO 501. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours.
courseSectionInformation: Same as AFRO 501. Approved for letter and S/U grading. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours.
